text: Joseph Parata Hohepa Hawke (1940 - 22 May 2022) was a New Zealand politician and Māori land rights activist. He was a member of Parliament for the Labour Party from 1996 to 2002. In the 2008 Queen's Birthday Honours, Hawke was appointed a Member of the New Zealand Order of Merit. Hawke died on 22 May 2022 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians Category:Māori rights activists
title: Joe Hawke
